Very nice and quiet place just love it !!

Very close to cool shops and restaurants. Nice quiet neighborhood. Eva was very responsive to our needs.
It was cute! Location was great. I think it was fair for the price.
Lovely place, just as described. Hostess was great to work with, very accomodating.
Perfect place for a quick solo trip. Thanks guys!

The cottage is very cozy and clean. Great location with restaurants within walking distance and a short drive to downtown. Quick response time from the host! I enjoyed my stay and would book this place again.
Loved this tiny little space & the area. Me and my husband had a great stay & would definitely return in the future!
Very cute, clean, and convenient!
A Lovely little spot just minutes away from the Plaza Arts district. Close to museums and all that good stuff in OKC. I highly recommend it!

Cute. Great location. Host was very nice and responsive to our concerns. The bed was comfy. It was cool to be able to see the neighbors‚Äô chickens. They weren‚Äôt noisy at all. I‚Äôd say the listing was accurate, and we had a great time running around OKC. I‚Äôm happy we were so close to the Plaza area. It was our favorite by far.
We really enjoyed our stay at Eva‚Äôs Airbnb- it was clean, cozy and private and had everything one would need. I only wish we could have stayed another night! Definitely recommended.

One of my favorite places I've stayed. This was exactly what I wanted - a cozy, clean and cute little place for my week in OKC. Right down the street from the Plaza and I didn't want to leave. Worth every penny and hope to stay here again.
Eva's place was great - a very easy walk down to the Plaza for fun eats and drinks, and a perfectly cozy little getaway!
Perfect for what we needed. It was nice having places to walk and eat. Felt private. Ubers around the city were pretty cheap. If I came back to OKC I would consider this listing!
Great Hostess,
Cozy cottage in a nice neighborhood.

We didn‚Äôt have an issue finding the address or getting to the backyard, but if you had very large or heavy suitcases it could be difficult as there was no paved path and you had to walk around the hosts vehicles in the driveway. Absolutely loved staying at Eva‚Äôs! Perfect distance to walk to the Plaza, and exactly what we needed for the weekend. Hope to visit again!
I really loved this place. It was small but it was cute. I would definitely come here again!
very comfortable, and clean! We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again!
This was such a cozy cottage in an ideal location so close to the Plaza District. Eva, the host, was helpful and friendly, I would love to stay here again!
Cute spot, def get the Scandi IKEA vibe here. Loved that the next door neighbor behind the unit had a chicken coup. Didn‚Äôt feel like you were in Oklahoma City üòÉ
Nice private area! Very cozy
We had a very cozy stay and felt right at home. We hope to stay here again!
Very nice quiet area, but there was a lot of things to do within driving/ walking distance. Eva was very clear with her directions so check in was a breeze.
Great stay
It's always a pleasure to stay and so close to town! Love staying here.
It was me and my partner‚Äôs one year anniversary and we wanted a cozy getaway, this was perfect!
Very nice and exactly as described. Easy entry and access. Beautiful part of town.
Eva is so kind and welcoming, and the space was great! It was exactly like the description. The neighborhood is beautiful, quiet, and close to everything.
This was a great place, great location and great hosts!
Everything was great!

Nice location- quiet and near restaurants. However, the hostess ignored multiple messages about our need for bath towels (never responded even though the messages were read). Cozy, Felt like home! Eva was great! Perfect for our weekend in OKC!
Great price! Cozy and cute accommodations. All was clean and nice.
Eva's place is a short walk from the Plaza District, and a very cozy and comfortable stay. Highly recommend!
What a great little hideaway! Definitely the breather I needed during my stay in Oklahoma! When I come back I will be sure to book again. Super cute neighborhood too!

Eva's place was beautiful, cozy, and very thoughtful. Perfect natural light and efficient layout for a small space. Amenities were just what we needed. Super walkable to the Plaza district, and a ton of cute houses throughout the neighborhood!
We had a great stay at Eva‚Äôs place. It was clean, she gave very clear instructions, and provided helpful information. Would definitely stay again!
This airbnb was a great stay for me. I was inbetween workstations and needed a place to stay for 2 nights and it right during Halloween. So the neighborhood was flooded with kiddos but it was nice.

Eva's place was a fantastic little private place tucked away in a nice neighborhood but not far from pretty much anything you would need. A grouping of restaurants was half a mile away and, like most things in OKC, anything else was just 15 minutes away. The place was clean and had everything I needed for the stay and Eva was super friendly and responsive. Great recommendations too. Highly recommended, would definitely stay here again!

Location is walking distance from the plaza district with plenty of things to do and places to eat.
The listing looks just like the photos and had everything we could need for a quick weekend stay.

Good place to stay while visiting family in OKC. We didn‚Äôt have a car so walking to the Plaza is a huge bonus - shops, bars, restaurants. The space is the perfect size for two. It‚Äôs nothing glamorous, but just fine for us!
Great stay!! We enjoyed our stay!
Really enjoyed staying at Eva's place. It was a great, cozy space with everything we needed while traveling. Would definitely stay again if we're in the area.
Our stay was so nice and peaceful! The bed is to absolutely die for! Everything was as described and I would definitely stay again.
Was the perfect host her and her husband gave me some good recommendations and was very friendly. Made my stay very pleasant.
Nice place. Great location. Useful amenities and items provided. Would stay again.
It was a good location and the bed was comfortable. It was a little hard to get belongings into the unit as the entry to the unit was the main tenants driveway so had to squeeze by cars.

Older, but fixed up.
Clean

I was only there for one night for a concert but Eva's place was quiet and clean and one of the few who has matcha in their home. I'm not a coffee drinker myself and when I saw there was matcha and even a kettle for me to make some I was over the moon with joy!! 10 out of 10 would stay here a again!
Beautiful place to stay!! Eva‚Äôs place had everything you could need! It was so cool to do many cool restaurants and shops. Perfect place to stay!
Super cute place to stay. The neighborhood is awesome. Definitely recommend!
My mother and I had a nice stay. It was quiet and private. The bed was comfortable and the place was clean. Thanks, Eva!
Really great place, very comfortable bed.
Wonderful spot! Walking distance to the plaza district - check out Mexican Radio for dinner! Would definitely stay again

Enjoyed our one night stay at Eva's house. Nice neighborhood in close proximity to a variety of restaurants and shops. It was too hot for us to walk around and explore, but we would definitely return to the area at a cooler time of year and do just that. We were traveling home after a long camping trip and had a lot of gear in our car but felt secure leaving it parked on the street. Appreciated that Eva already had the air conditioning on so that the space was cool when we arrived. Appreciated the awesome coffee setup even more.
Great place to stay for a weekend trip!

We stayed at the plaza cottage for one night. It was perfect for a night getaway to celebrate my girlfriends birthday. We decided to stay in but there was so much to do around us. Very clean and would stay again.
The space was just what was needed and great for the price.
Cute spot! The bed was very comfortable!
In town to catch a concert and had the most charming stay at Eva‚Äôs place. Very cute, clean and quiet!

My husband and I had a great anniversary weekend at the cottage. We love exploring the Plaza District so the proximity was awesome. We went to a concert at Beer City Music Hall and it was a short drive just like the various local breweries. Eva and her family are so sweet and accommodating. We would recommend this place to any couple looking for a fun, romantic, weekend.
Great stay...everything as stated!

We absolutely loved this place in OKC! We were there just one night on a road trip and it had everything we needed. The space is perfect for a short or long stay and the neighborhood has such great restaurants and shops. Highly recommend!

I was passing through and only stayed for one night but the cottage was so cozy and welcoming, I wish I was there longer. It is very walkable to restaurants and bars and in a quiet neighborhood where I felt very safe. 10/10 would absolutely recommend!
I had a lovely stay at the cottage--the bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom and kitchen were very well-stocked! It was a little bit of a challenge to locate at night time, but I managed.

We had a nice overnight stay at Eva‚Äôs cottage while we were in OKC. It is in a quiet neighborhood, set back behind the main house. It is a short walking distance from restaurants at Midtown. It has all the amenities you need for a short stay. Thank you!

Our stay in Eva‚Äôs cottage was great! We felt like home! Everything was like in the description. The neighborhood was really beatiful and safe. Eva and his husband have been really kind and give us useful suggestions! We would like to come back to OKC!
Very cute, just like the pics. Only stayed for one night but it was exactly what I needed! Thanks Eva!!

Our stay at Eva's was fantastic. The place was super cute and clean. I would definitely stay at it again. The neighborhood was peaceful and I felt very safe. As we walked down the walkway to the private stay the hosts were on the front porch hanging out and we were able to chat and get to know each other some. Super welcoming and friendly!!
Eva's place was so cute and lovely. We were passing through Oklahoma City and I highly recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed this space! It was easy to get around to everything we needed in OKC and we enjoyed being close to some fun local restaurants and shops. it was in a nice location, clean, and safe. Eva was helpful and communicative. I appreciated having matcha and milk in the fridge! it was a nice convenience
This was a great location. We walked to restaurants and a short distance from many great neighborhoods. It was soo quiet. Very private and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again
Loved this spot! It was perfect for my wife and I. Really close to lots of things in OKC.
The place is nice but very hard to find the location at night, I arrived at 9:30pm and hopefully one neighbor helped me to locate the house.
We enjoyed staying here. It was a quick walk to a strip of local restaurants and close to our other destinations in the city. Easy check in and clean.
Lovely spot! We had a show at The Tower Theatre and it was the perfect stay. Would definitely stay again.

It was perfect for my couple day say in OKC! I loved how close it was to the Plaza District restaurants and it was even close enough for us to scooter to downtown! The mattress was so comfortable that before I left I took a picture of tag on it because I want one in my house!
Eva's place was a wonderful choice for our night in OKC! She was so easy to communicate with. Highly recommend!

Turns out she got me everything to make it because she dug deeper and found out the place she mentioned stopped serving matcha and she didn‚Äôt want me to miss out.
The cherry on top of our trip
We enjoyed our stay very much. Eva was a terrific host and great communicator, and we would certainly stay here again.
Sure, we could come again. Nice stay.

The space was a little small and a bit noisy with it being a converted shed behind a home, but aside from that it was quiet at night and very cozy. Lovely little cottage :)
this place had everything we needed for our quick stay! the bed was very comfortable and the place was very clean. we definitely recommend.
Quaint and charming guest cottage walking distance to neighborhood food and drink! Comfortable and peaceful space with friendly and accommodating hosts.

Eva‚Äôs place was a nice and secluded getaway in OKC! It was just a 10 minute commute downtown, and had a beautiful quaint kitchenette and bedroom! It was great! The check in was simple and the place was well stocked. Would def return when in OKC!

I wouldn't go out of my way to find it again. It is suitable for one or maybe two ppl for a few nights.
Bed is comfy.

Thank you Eva, Truman, Viliam, Winter, and Smillen( forgive spelling mistakes) for opening your home to me. Many blessings to you.
Awesome host and an awesome cottage! Thanks Eva!
Eva‚Äôs house was super cute and clean! It‚Äôs the perfect size for a couples weekend. It‚Äôs also located near a bunch of different restaurants and things to do.

Nice cozy little place with hot water and good heat! Just right for our needs!
Eva has a great place! It's easy to find and has plenty of street parking. Clean, cute, and comfortable. It's also easy walking distance to the Plaza district which is a massive bonus!
Fantastic, cozy cottage with easy access to great food and entertainment. Quiet and beautiful neighborhood and still very secluded
As described. Has everything you need for your stay. Small ish drive way that is sometimes hard to get through without having to step in the grass/under small tree branches. Worth the price!
The Airbnb was so cute! We really enjoyed our stay.
The place was clean, quiet, and so close to everything.m in the city. We will definitely stay again!

An adorable and well-appointed cottage! Would definitely stay again. Great area, LOTS of shops but also private and peaceful. Extremely comfortable bed and lots more amenities than some larger places I've stayed, quite impressive! Charming place that was just the right size for two people to accommodate our brief stay. It was clean, comfortable, easy to find and a short walk from the Plaza district where there were plenty of places to eat or grab a beer.
Extremely comfortable, safe, and a great host -- perfect for my work trip. Highly recommend!

Nice owners, very clean house, and easy walk to plaza.
I had a great stay and was walking distance from the plaza district
We loved this cute little place! Also, the bed was the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in!
llll

This place was amazing! We absolutely loved the stay! Would definitely go back!!

Great AIRBNB! Had everything that you need & was a very cute space, as described. Would stay here again!
We had a wonderful stay! Eva was a responsive and helpful host. We had a smooth check in! The cottage is very cozy and had everything we need! Easy Uber to downtown OKC. We would recommend
Eva‚Äôs place was one of the best Airbnb‚Äôs I‚Äôve stayed in‚Äîso cozy and welcoming and I felt really safe there as a solo female traveler! Will definitely stay here again if in the area!
I slept like a baby in a luxurious bed. Cool historic neighberhood. Cottage nicely modernized.
Eva‚Äôs place was so cozy and cute! Also walking distance to some great restaurants. Definitely recommend staying here!
Great place to stay for a night or two. Plenty of coffee, creamer, etc. Excellent Wi-Fi, very comfortable bed.
The house was clean and very comfy. It was a great stay.
Warm and cosy little place to stay!
Loved staying in Eva's cozy space. It was close to everything we wanted to do! Looking forward to returning!
Absolutely beautiful place, cozy and comfortable, great location too. Loved our stay so much.

We loved everything about this little jewel of a place. The location was excellent and near everything downtown. Everything was sparkling clean and luxuriously comfortable. Perfect place. Made my stay in OKC so easy.
Slightly inaccessible overall especially with luggage, no pavement to door with low hanging tree in path. Host frequently accessed garage connected to Airbnb, very startling.

Great, cozy space with easy access to fun, quirky Plaza neighborhood and not far from Paseo neighborhood. Veryquiet, area that this solo female traveler deemed safe & walkable. From the time we arrived to the time we left, there were no issues whatsoever. The space was beautiful and very cozy. The perfect place for a couple or single traveler. Everything I wanted to do was within a 10 minute drive. Very convenient location. I am on a quest to find the best tiny home in the downtown OKC area. So far this one is at the top of my list. I loved everything about it and will be back again.
The space was perfect and Eva was very accommodating!
Perfect cottage for our short stay in okc. Clean, comfortable and just enough space for my husband and I. Would stay again.
Cozy little apartment in a perfect location. Close to almost anything around the city. Enjoyed our stay!
Cute space, has all accessories you need for a quick stay. Nice touch with the bath amenities :)
The cortage was a dream, and the host was wonderful to work with.

Such an affordable and comfortable stay in a charming neighborhood. There is so much in walking distance and we just happened to be there when murals were being painted in the Plaza.
If you are looking for comfort and value in a cute little package, this is a great space.

Great location, has everything you need for a short or extended stay. She has added some nice touches providing milk, oatmeal, selection of coffee and toiletries Parking not so great being on a narrow street. All in all great place to stay quiet neighborhood.
I would stay again if I was traveling to that city.

Such a great little place for us to stay for a weekend get away, super clean and cozy place. Close to so many cool little places to eat and see along with it being close enough for us to drive to Norman for a football game.
Eva‚Äôs place was incredible! So cute, location was great, and it worked perfect for our vacation needs! Thank you so much!
I enjoyed my stay very much. I would book this place again.

we HATED having to park on the street next to unkept bushes, they scraped our vehicle. the shower was also very tiny. the children playing in the pool was also very loud..we knew they had children but thought they would be further away from our stay.
there were also chickens in the back, not so great of a lovely wake up call in the middle of a city.
other than those things, the place was lovely and very well kept!
My husband and I loved our stay! It was the best location for walking to the plaza to play arcade games at up down and have brunch at the press. It was a cozy and cute space.

Great location for a short walk to the plaza. The place was perfect for me and the bed was super comfortable. It comes with a keurig for a quick cup of coffee.
A nice spot for a quiet rest!
Cute sleepout, tastefully decorated. Amazing Mattress really got a good rest and was ready to continue driving the next day, great location accessible to many eats. Would stay again.
Comfortable clean efficient - perfect for an overnight stay.
This was a fantastic find! Cozy little cottage nestled in a quiet neighborhood right next to the plaza. They really made it feel like home.
Adorable location and very close to downtown OKC! Was a great place to stay during our trip.
Lovely cottage actually within walking distance of lots of fun restaurants and shops
Super cute & Cozy!
Perfect cozy stay in OKC! Walking distance to plenty of local spots and close to everything downtown as well.
We had a great time stopping by. Great location. Thanks so much!
Super clean, great location for bricktown (10 dollar uber) and super affordable. Very Comfortable!
Great spot, perfect for an overnight. Walkable to tons of great bars and dinner spots. Highly recommended!
The apartment was very clean, comfortable and well-outfitted. Great location and great communication from Eva. Thanks for a great stay!

We loved staying here! It was very clean and safe, not to mention the perfect size for two people. We loved walking around in the plaza nearby, and it was only a 10-15 minute drive from everywhere we visited. We would definitely stay here again!
The cutest and coziest guesthouse! Perfect for a short trip
Quiet and very cute. It‚Äôs a lovely place, incredibly clean.
